channel.title: Get the sexy sounds from flash!
channel.description:
Okay this is going to explain how to get the mp3s out of flash movies and such. I'm going to be using the example of the hippo noodles song LINK: http://www.ebaumsworld.com/flash/hipponoodles.html
What you need: Firefox : [url=http://download.mozilla.org/?product=firefox-2.0.0.1&os=win&lang=en-US]Click[/url] Fast video download add-on for Firefox: [url=http://releases.mozilla.org/pub/mozilla.org/extensions/fast_video_download/fast_video_download-1.3.1.1-fx.xpi]Click![/url] Win SWF Extractor: [url=http://www.dream-soft.org/down/WinSWFExtractor.exe]Click[/url]
If you don't already have firefox install it. Then download the Fast video download add-on and install and and all that. Then install WinSWFextractor.
Now, go to the hippo video and click on the Fast video download button at the bottom right of firefox.
Download and save the video into where-ever.
Get the WinSWF Exractor and open up the hippo file in it. Then right click on the Mp3 and save as.
Viola!
More you say? Okay i say!
Now if you wanted the video with it too then just download [url=http://www.veffect.com/total-video-converter/tvc.exe]total video converter[/url] (serial : 0ab52023-ba00347e-9fa86acd-fdc330a9-68578b7e-264b81e1 )
Then open up the hippo thing in that and convert it to whatever!
Yay do the happy dance everybody![br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2006, 08:17:13 AM[/size][hr]I know you're viewing! Now come and play with me!
